Text: AGA NumbersPST Jon Has your view that we are likely to see prices trending down changed based on the AGA numbers that we saw yesterday Or is that just a short term fluctuation KJ
CODA Deal Closed Cc PST This deal was executed this afternoon Thanks KJ

RE Natural Gas PricingPST Thanks Jon I have used Fridays prices with a large margin for the latest indicative prices that I needed Oct Nov yrs Disturnal said that prices were off throughout the curves from Friday KJ Original Message From Mckay Jonathan Sent Tuesday August PM To Joslyn Kate Subject RE Natural Gas Pricing yahooway to gokeepm comin Original Message From Joslyn Kate Sent Tuesday August PM To Mckay Jonathan Cc Bruce Chad Subject RE Natural Gas Pricing McKay we have closed this deal yrs out of Oct We will complete the risk mgmt spreadsheet shortly KJ Original Message From Mckay Jonathan Sent Tuesday August AM To Joslyn Kate Subject RE Natural Gas Pricing Year Year Cheers Original Message From Joslyn Kate Sent Tuesday August AM To Mckay Jonathan Subject Natural Gas Pricing Importance High Jon Please price the following volumes out of Oct GJmonth Oct Nov Dec Jan Feb Mar April May June July August Sept yr yr Thanks Kate

CEP Automotive Cc PST Laura Renouf completed this deal today Please note that the volumes for the sale to the customer are different from the buy volumes from ECC to avoid the previous rounding problems Please call Laura or myself if you have any questions Thanks Kate

RE Market Fundamentals VolumesPST Thanks Jon Original Message From Mckay Jonathan Sent Monday June AM To Joslyn Kate Subject FW Market Fundamentals Volumes Original Message From Cooke Ian Sent Friday June AM To Mckay Jonathan Subject RE Market Fundamentals Volumes Hi Jon Enron currently markets about bcf of NIT per day but there is no real way of measuring total NITs taking place in the market place each day I have been told that although the total gas produced in Alberta is over bcf a day that the NIT number can easily be double this It doesnt appear that Enron markets of Albertas gas each dayyet I hope this answers your question let me know if you need anything else Ian Original Message From Jonathan McKay Sent Thursday June PM To Ian Cooke Subject Market Fundamentals Volumes Start with Peggy Hedstrom and find out if this is accurate and get back to me Thanks Jon Forwarded by Jonathan McKayCALECT on AM From Kate nronXgate on AM CDT To Jonathan CT cc Subject Market Fundamentals Volumes Jon We are getting ready to do a public launch of Enron Direct When I was in Toronto Jeff Borg said that Enron Canada marketed of the gas produced in Alberta Do you have a feel for the actual of gas Can we publically make this representation Would it be possible to get a copy of the fundamentals that one of your analysts puts together for the morning meeting Many thanks Kate

Market Fundamentals VolumesPST Jon We are getting ready to do a public launch of Enron Direct When I was in Toronto Jeff Borg said that Enron Canada marketed of the gas produced in Alberta Do you have a feel for the actual of gas Can we publically make this representation Would it be possible to get a copy of the fundamentals that one of your analysts puts together for the morning meeting Many thanks Kate

Cc PST Jon We would like to reduce Boardwalks AECO Daily priced volume by the following GJmonth For June please reduce the position equally by the number of days remaining in the month Please advise us of any costs associated with this transaction How we deal with the remaining portion of the volume is dependent on final resolution with Boardwalk Many thanks Kate

Re Calgary and Edmonton Vacancy Rates and Poplation StatsPST Jon Is this model based on HDD Will it be appropriate for the Canadian Climate Scott is still waiting on the vacancy rates for Calgary we will forward it as soon as we can Please let us know if there is any further information that you need Thanks for your help Kate Jonathan McKay AM To Scott CT cc Kate CT Subject Re Calgary and Edmonton Vacancy Rates and Poplation Stats Im waiting on an approved model form Houston that incorporates the correlation between price and an consumption It is suppose to show up anytime now This information should help us manage these correlation between these risks Thanks Jon Embedded StdOleLink

Update on PricingPST Jon Could you please provide us with pricing for the following Flat GJmonth starting Aug for and years Flat Gjmonth for the period NOVMARCH Starting August below volumes Month Volume GJ January February March April May June July August September October November December Total Term and Years Thanks Kate
